data.eml:eml: New species of Dispio Hartman, 1951 and Streblospio Webster, 1879 (Polychaeta, Spionidae) from the coast of the Iberian Peninsula

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Delgado-Blas, Víctor Hugo, Díaz-Díaz, Óscar, Viéitez, José M. (2018): New species of Dispio Hartman, 1951 and Streblospio Webster, 1879 (Polychaeta, Spionidae) from the coast of the Iberian Peninsula. Zootaxa 4410 (3): 525-538, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4410.3.6
